com.github.dandelion.core.util.scanner

Interface UrlResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JBossVFS2UrlResolver, JBossVFS3UrlResolver, StandardUrlResolver, WebSphereUrlResolver

    public interface UrlResolver

    Resolves container-specific URLs into standard Java URLs.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Thibault Duchateau

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      URL toStandardUrl(URL url)
      Resolves the passed URL, which may be container-specific, into a standard Java URL.

    • Method Detail

      • toStandardUrl

        URL toStandardUrl(URL url)
                  throws IOException

        Resolves the passed URL, which may be container-specific, into a standard Java URL.

        Parameters:
        url - The URL to resolve.
        Returns:
        The matching standard Java URL.
        Throws:
        IOException - if something goes wrong during the scanning.
